Name: ConceptSchemeName
Description: A name for the ConceptScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the ConceptScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the ConceptScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages and supports the use of structured content.

Name: ConceptSchemeReference
Description: Reference to an existing ConceptScheme for inclusion.

Name: Vocabulary
Description: Identifies and describes the vocabulary used to create the concept scheme.

Name: ConceptGroupReference
Description: Allows for grouping of concepts for administrative or conceptual purposes; groups may have a hierarchical structure.
